101.tag_detail: Aether Gazer's high-end business yacht with a semi-open landscape view.

102.tag_detail: Put on Whispering Waves to get a special voice and interactive action in the scene.

103.tag_detail: The atmosphere of the scene will change at different times of day.

104.tag_detail: Exclusive environment sound effects which provide a highly immersive experience. Can be switched on and off from the page.
